cdist-type__chroot_mount(7)
===================================

NAME
----
cdist-type__chroot_mount - mount a chroot


DESCRIPTION
-----------
Mount and prepare a chroot for running commands within it.


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
-------------------
None


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
-------------------
None


EXAMPLES
--------

.. code-block:: sh

    __chroot_mount /path/to/chroot
